Description: Required skills to be successful:• Extensive knowledge of inventory management systems & Supply chain modules in other ERP systems like SAP• Proficiency in MS Office (Word/ Excel/ PowerPoint/MS Projects)• Demonstrated experience developing management reporting packs and presenting to senior leadership.• Skilled in problem solving and continuous improvement methodologiesAbout The Team:The role will report to the Operations Manager and you will be working in a busy Parts Distribution Center located in Dubai Investment ParkWhat Equips You For The Role:• Bachelors/ master’s in supply chain management, Industrial Engineering or equivalent• Around 5 years of experience in the field of Supply Chain, preferably with Automotive experience.Job Details
